sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of Verizon Communications ( VZ ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.4%.
Year to date, Verizon Communications registers a 2.0% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Apple ( AAPL ), trading down 1.0%.
Apple is showing a gain of 3.5% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ), trading down 0.4%, and Goldman Sachs Group ( GS ), trading up 1.3% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
